@notice User funds will be less after FlashLoan is completed
 @dev User balance on contract (accounts[msg.sender]) is updated during the loan operation

devdoc.author: Marques Traylor
devdoc.details: User deposits fee, contract performs flash loan, left over balance automatically withdrawn from contract and sent back to user

returns._0: uint Current balance account has on contract

constructor.details: Pass the address as a parameter to deployer in migrations along with the contract

deposit(uint256).details: Must deposit first before calling initiateFlashLoan

initiateFlashLoan(address,uint256).details: Caller must deposit premium before requesting a FlashLoan

params.amount: Amount of tplem to request for the loan
params.token: Token address for the asset User wants to loan

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: User balance on contract (accounts[msg.sender]) is updated during the loan operation

devdoc.title: A contract for Aave FlashLoan interaction

balanceFor(address).notice: Query the current balance of an accountWill return 0 if account has not deposited yet

methods.constructor: Aave V1 contract addresses may be found here - https://docs.aave.com/developers/v/1.0/deployed-contracts/deployed-contract-instances

deposit(uint256).notice: Used for Flash Loan premium (fee) deposit

initiateFlashLoan(address,uint256).notice: Attempt to retrieve a flashloan for requested amountUses Aave V1 which only requires 1 asset address to be passed

withdraw().notice: User funds will be less after FlashLoan is completed
